strapiEvent.name: Succulent 101 (Make & Take)
strapiEvent.location: Botanical Garden of the Ozarks - Fayetteville, AR
strapiEvent.description:
Learn all about succulents with our Garden Designer, Lee Witty! Participants will learn how to make new succulent planters and how to revive old ones in this fun make & take class.

Potting mix, succulents, and bonsai-style pot provided by BGO. All participants will take home their pot planted full of beautiful succulents.

$55/members or $65/nonmembers
